TextView.android:text: by Hans Albers. Developed in my free time. No commercial support or intent.

Ever had the feeling that your phone is listening to you ? If your phone is listening to you, Skewy can make this difficult by skewing/masking your voice. If used right, eavesdropping will not be easy.

Ever thought that your phone is accessed without you noticing ? Technologies such as Silverpush are using the inaudible frequency range to exchange information with your phone. This is a threat to your privacy. (Reference: Arp et al. (2017): Privacy Threats through Ultrasonic Side Channels on Mobile Devices, TU Braunschweig). Skewy tries to identify such signals. Upon detection Skewy can emit a signal in the inaudible frequency range, trying to distort the unwanted signal.
Skewy tries to make eavesdropping and unwanted access of you phone difficult. However there is no guarantee in any case.
If you find bugs, have suggestions or even want to help developing this App, please contact: skewyapp@gmail.com
